## Protocol.Tracing.TraceConfig.recordMode property

Controls how the trace buffer stores data. (TraceConfigRecordMode enum)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
recordMode?: ('recordUntilFull' | 'recordContinuously' | 'recordAsMuchAsPossible' | 'echoToConsole');
```
